title: Web3 Career Assessment
description: Find your ideal Web3 career path based on your interests and skills

questions.question: What work environment do you prefer?
What motivates you most about Web3?

developer.title: Web3 Developer
developer.description: You are perfect for building the future of the internet!
developer.advice: Focus on Solidity, smart contract development, and dApp creation. Consider specializing in DeFi protocols, NFT platforms, or Layer 2 solutions.

designer.title: Web3 UX/UI Designer
designer.description: Web3 desperately needs great designers to improve user experience.
designer.advice: Learn about wallet UX, DeFi interfaces, and NFT marketplaces. Your skills in making complex systems simple are invaluable in Web3.

analyst.title: Web3 Analyst
analyst.description: Your analytical skills are crucial for understanding Web3 markets.
analyst.advice: Dive into on-chain analytics, tokenomics research, and DeFi protocol analysis. Consider roles at crypto funds or research firms.

content.title: Web3 Content Creator
content.description: Web3 needs clear communicators to bridge the knowledge gap.
content.advice: Create educational content, technical documentation, or community resources. Consider roles in developer relations or content marketing.

community.title: Web3 Community Manager
community.description: Strong communities are the backbone of successful Web3 projects.
community.advice: Focus on Discord/Telegram management, DAO governance, and community growth strategies. Your people skills are essential for Web3 adoption.
